wikipedia_page.main: Paula Jane Bradshaw (born 1 November 1972) is an Alliance Party of  Northern Ireland   politician. She has been a Member of the Northern Ireland Assembly (MLA) for South Belfast since the 2016 election.

response: He was one of a number of high-profile Ulster Unionist moderates who left the party along with Harry Hamilton and Paula Bradshaw, both of whom joined the Alliance Party of Northern Ireland, and Trevor Ringland, who joined the NI Conservatives.
The area is represented in the Northern Ireland Assembly by Clare Bailey, Matthew O'Toole, Paula Bradshaw, Deirdre Hargey and Christopher Stalford.

Parsley has been married to South Belfast Alliance MLA Paula Bradshaw since 2011. He is an avid Arsenal FC fan and a keen language hobbyist, a subject about which he often writes.
